name: Climbey
description: Climbey is a VR-only climbing game! The goal is to climb to the finish as fast as you can, avoiding obstacles and trying not to fall along the way.
minimum_requirements: Processor: Any i5 or Ryzen 5 Graphics: NVidia Geforce GTX 1050 Ti Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Additional disk space required for user created content.
recommended_requirements: Processor: Any i7 or Ryzen 7 Graphics: NVidia Geforce GTX 1070 Storage: 700 MB available space Additional Notes: Additional disk space required for user created content.
